Record.ClassificationPath: Female Urogenital Diseases and Pregnancy Complications/Pregnancy Complications/Obstetric Labor Complications/Fetal Membranes, Premature Rupture
Record.BroaderTerm: Female Urogenital Diseases and Pregnancy Complications
Record.Synonym: Preterm Premature Rupture of Fetal Membranes
Record.Description: Spontaneous tearing of the membranes surrounding the FETUS any time before the onset of OBSTETRIC LABOR. Preterm PROM is membrane rupture before 37 weeks of GESTATION.
